690730.name: Gangs of Space - Tiger Pack
690730.description:
Please note that the Gangs of Space servers will be permanently closed after May 31, 2019. You will not be able to enjoy your DLC after this date.

The Tiger Pack contains the following:

• unlock the remaining 15 item slots in your first Warehouse
• one extra ship slot in your Hangar
• the Tiger skin for Gemeter ships (Early Access exclusive)
• 50,000 Credits
• the right to name a crew in the game (Early Access exclusive)
• the Tiger title

Early Access exclusive:


Items marked as Early Access exclusive are only available if you purchase these packs while the game is in Early Access. They are immediately available, and you will get to keep them after the game release too. There will be no way to get these items after the game leaves Early Access.

Credits:


Credits are used to purchase advanced versions of the playable ships once you have unlocked them in the game.

Credits can be earned in the game by conquering sectors; thus the Credits you obtain in the packs are just a quality-of-life improvement, and are in no way necessary to enjoy the full content of the game.

Multiple packs:


If you purchase multiple packs, please note that the "remaining 15 item slots in your first Warehouse" will be unlocked only once. All the other rewards will be added up to your account properly.
